contextId.quote: a people as numerous as the dust of the earth

contextId.information: AT: "rare and valuable metals to be abundant" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: silver and gold as common in Jerusalem as the stones

contextId.information: The upper part of a pillar is called a capital. AT: "bowl-shaped tops" or "bowl-shaped upper parts" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
